document.full_text: sluggers josh hamilton and nelson cruz returned to the texas lineup in style, each blasting home runs in the rangers' 4-0 victory over the chicago white sox on monday.
document.title: hamilton, cruz homer in triumphant return to texas
lines_and_colors: sluggers josh hamilton and nelson cruz returned to the texas lineup in style, each blasting home runs in the rangers' 4-0 victory over the chicago white sox on monday.
